00036 #define DZ_BLOCK_ARRAY_GROW_SIZE 16

00039     Class definitions

00042 template <class DataType>
00043 class DzTBlockArray {
00044 public:
00045     DzTBlockArray( int bSize = 32 );
00046     ~DzTBlockArray();
00047 
00048     //
00049     // MANIPULATORS
00050     //
00051 
00052     DzTBlockArray<DataType>&    operator=( const DzTBlockArray<DataType> &from );
00053     DataType&       operator[]( int i );
00054     DataType&       at( int i );
00055     void            append( const DataType &obj );
00056     void            append( int num, const DataType *obj );
00057     int             appendIfUnique( const DataType &obj );
00058     void            removeByIndex( int index, int num = 1 );
00059     void            removeFromEnd( int num = 1 );
00060     bool            remove( const DataType &obj );
00061     void            clear( bool freeMem = false );
00062 
00063     //
00064     // ACCESSORS
00065     //
00066 
00067     const DataType& operator[]( int i ) const;
00068     const DataType& at( int i ) const;
00069     int             count() const { return ( m_curBlockIdx * m_blockSize ) + m_nBlockItems; }
00070     int             find( const DataType obj ) const;
00071     void            copyToArray( DataType *array ) const;
00072     int             getBlockSize()  { return m_blockSize; }
00073 
00074 protected:
00075     //
00076     // DATA MEMBERS
00077     //
00078 
00079     int         m_nBlocks, m_nBlockSlots, m_blockSize, m_curBlockIdx, m_nBlockItems;
00080     DataType    **m_blocks;
00081 
00082 private:
00083 
00084     bool        addBlocks( int num );
00085 };

00087 /******************************************************************************/
00088 template <class DataType>
00089 DzTBlockArray<DataType>::DzTBlockArray( int bSize ) :
00090     m_nBlockItems( 0 ), m_blocks( NULL ), m_nBlocks( 0 ),
00091     m_curBlockIdx( 0 ), m_nBlockSlots( 0 )
00092 {
00093     int     size = 1;
00094 
00095     // Round the block size to the next larger power of two.
00096     while( size < bSize )
00097         size = size << 1;
00098 
00099     m_blockSize = size;
00100     addBlocks( 1 ); // Need to have a block to start with.
00101 }
00102 
00103 /******************************************************************************/
00104 template <class DataType>
00105 DzTBlockArray<DataType>::~DzTBlockArray()
00106 {
00107     if( m_blocks ) {
00108         for( int i = 0; i < m_nBlocks; ++i )
00109             delete [] m_blocks[i];
00110         dzFree( (void*) m_blocks );
00111     }
00112 }
00113 
00114 /******************************************************************************/
00115 template <class DataType>
00116 DzTBlockArray<DataType>& DzTBlockArray<DataType>::operator=( const DzTBlockArray<DataType> &from )
00117 {
00118     int i, num = from.count();
00119 
00120     //m_blockSize = from.m_blockSize;
00121 
00122     clear( true );
00123 
00124     for( i = 0; i < num; ++i )
00125         append( from[i] );
00126 
00127     return *this;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /******************************************************************************/
00131 template <class DataType>
00132 DataType& DzTBlockArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i )
00133 {
00134     if( i >= count() || i < 0 ){
00135         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTBlockArray::operator[]" );
00136         return m_blocks[0][0];
00137     }
00138 
00139     return m_blocks[i/m_blockSize][i%m_blockSize];
00140 }
00141 
00142 /******************************************************************************/
00143 template <class DataType>
00144 DataType& DzTBlockArray<DataType>::at( int i )
00145 {
00146     if( i >= count() || i < 0 ){
00147         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTBlockArray::at()" );
00148         return m_blocks[0][0];
00149     }
00150 
00151     return m_blocks[i/m_blockSize][i%m_blockSize];
00152 }
00153 
00154 /******************************************************************************/
00155 template <class DataType>
00156 void DzTBlockArray<DataType>::append( const DataType &obj )
00157 {
00158     if( m_nBlockItems >= m_blockSize ) {
00159         m_curBlockIdx++;
00160         if( m_curBlockIdx >= m_nBlocks )
00161             addBlocks( 1 );
00162         m_nBlockItems = 0;
00163     }
00164 
00165     m_blocks[m_curBlockIdx][m_nBlockItems++] = obj;
00166 }
00167 
00168 /******************************************************************************/
00169 template <class DataType>
00170 void DzTBlockArray<DataType>::append( int num, const DataType *obj )
00171 {
00172     if( num < 1 ){
00173         DZ_WARNING( "Less than one item specified to add in DzTBlockArray::append()" );
00174         return;
00175     }
00176 
00177     for( int i = 0; i < num; ++i )
00178         append( obj[i] );
00179 }
00180 
00181 /******************************************************************************/
00182 template <class DataType>
00183 int DzTBlockArray<DataType>::appendIfUnique( const DataType &obj )
00184 {
00185     int idx = find( obj );
00186 
00187     if( idx < 0 ){
00188         idx = count();
00189         append( obj );
00190     }
00191 
00192     return idx;
00193 }
00194 
00195 /******************************************************************************/
00196 template <class DataType>
00197 void DzTBlockArray<DataType>::removeByIndex( int index, int num )
00198 {
00199     int cnt = count();
00200     int nItems;
00201 
00202     if( index < 0 || index >= cnt ){
00203         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid starting index specified in DzTBlockArray::removeByIndex()" );
00204         return;
00205     }
00206 
00207     if( index + num > cnt ){
00208         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for removal in DzTBlockArray::removeByIndex()" );
00209         num = cnt - index;
00210     }
00211 
00212     nItems = cnt - num;
00213     for( int i = index; i < nItems; ++i )
00214         (*this)[i] = (*this)[i+num];
00215 
00216     m_nBlockItems -= num;
00217 
00218     while( m_nBlockItems <= 0 && m_curBlockIdx > 0 ){
00219         m_curBlockIdx--;
00220         m_nBlockItems += m_blockSize;
00221     }
00222 
00223     if( m_nBlockItems < 0 )
00224         m_nBlockItems = 0;
00225 }
00226 
00227 /******************************************************************************/
00228 template <class DataType>
00229 bool DzTBlockArray<DataType>::remove( const DataType &obj )
00230 {
00231     int result = find( obj );
00232     if( result < 0 )
00233         return false;
00234 
00235     removeByIndex( result );
00236 
00237     return true;
00238 }
00239 
00240 /******************************************************************************/
00241 template <class DataType>
00242 void DzTBlockArray<DataType>::clear( bool freeMem )
00243 {
00244     if( freeMem ) {
00245         for( int i = 0; i < m_nBlocks; ++i ) {
00246             delete [] m_blocks[i];
00247             m_blocks[i] = NULL;
00248         }
00249         m_nBlocks = 0;
00250     }
00251     m_curBlockIdx = 0;
00252     m_nBlockItems = 0;
00253 
00254     // must have at least one block
00255     if( freeMem )
00256         addBlocks( 1 );
00257 }
00258

00260 template <class DataType>
00261 const DataType& DzTBlockArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i ) const
00262 {
00263     if( i >= count() || i < 0 ){
00264         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTBlockArray::operator[]" );
00265         return m_blocks[0][0];
00266     }
00267 
00268     return m_blocks[i/m_blockSize][i%m_blockSize];
00269 }

00271 /******************************************************************************/
00272 template <class DataType>
00273 const DataType& DzTBlockArray<DataType>::at( int i ) const
00274 {
00275     if( i >= count() || i < 0 ){
00276         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTBlockArray::at()" );
00277         return m_blocks[0][0];
00278     }
00279     return m_blocks[i/m_blockSize][i%m_blockSize];
00280 }

00282 /******************************************************************************/
00283 template <class DataType>
00284 int DzTBlockArray<DataType>::find( const DataType obj ) const
00285 {
00286     /*int   i, j;
00287     DataType        *ptr;
00288 
00289     for( i = 0; i < m_curBlockIdx - 1; i++ ) {
00290         ptr = m_blocks[i];
00291         for( j = 0; j < m_blockSize; ++j ) {
00292             if( obj == ptr[j] )
00293                 return ( j + i * m_blockSize );
00294         }
00295     }
00296     ptr = m_blocks[m_curBlockIdx];

00298         if( obj == ptr[j] )

00300     }
00301     return -1; this code seems to be doing no good, we'll try the high-level way for now */
00302 
00303     int i, num = count();
00304 
00305     for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ){
00306         if( (*this)[i] == obj )
00307             return i;
00308     }
00309 
00310     return -1;

00313 /******************************************************************************/
00314 template <class DataType>
00315 void DzTBlockArray<DataType>::copyToArray( DataType *array ) const
00316 {
00317     int i, num = m_nBlocks - 1;
00318 
00319     for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ){
00320         memcpy( array, m_blocks[i], m_blockSize * sizeof( DataType ) );
00321         array += m_blockSize;
00322     }
00323 
00324     if( m_nBlocks > 0 )
00325         memcpy( array, m_blocks[m_nBlocks - 1], m_nBlockItems * sizeof( DataType ) );
00326 }
00327 
00328 /******************************************************************************/
00329 template <class DataType>
00330 bool DzTBlockArray<DataType>::addBlocks( int num )
00331 {
00332     int i;
00333 
00334     if( m_nBlocks + num >= m_nBlockSlots ) {
00335         m_nBlockSlots += ( num > DZ_BLOCK_ARRAY_GROW_SIZE ? num : DZ_BLOCK_ARRAY_GROW_SIZE );
00336         DataType **newBlocks = (DataType**) dzMalloc( m_nBlockSlots * sizeof( DataType* ) );
00337 
00338         if( m_blocks ) {
00339             memcpy( newBlocks, m_blocks, m_nBlocks * sizeof( DataType* ) );
00340             dzFree( (void*) m_blocks );
00341         }
00342         m_blocks = newBlocks;
00343     }
00344 
00345     for( i = m_nBlocks; i < m_nBlocks + num; ++i ) {
00346         m_blocks[i] = new DataType[m_blockSize];
00347         // Make sure the memory allocation was successful.
00348         if( !m_blocks[i] ) {
00349             m_nBlockSlots -= num;
00350             throw "Out of memory in DzTBlockArray::addBlocks";
00351         }
00352     }
00353     m_nBlocks += num;
00354 
00355     return true;
00356 }
